Package edu.stanford.nlp.coref.statistical

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EvalUtils.Evaluator  
    SimpleLinearClassifier.LearningRateSchedule  
    SimpleLinearClassifier.Loss  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Clusterer
    System for building up coreference clusters incrementally, merging a pair of clusters each step.
    Clusterer.Cluster  
    ClustererDataLoader
    Loads the data used to train Clusterer.
    ClustererDataLoader.ClustererDoc  
    ClusteringCorefAlgorithm
    Builds up coreference clusters incrementally with agglomerative clustering.
    CompressedFeatureVector
    A low-memory representation of a Counter created by a Compressor.
    Compressor<K>
    Converts a Counter to a CompressedFeatureVector (i.e., parallel lists of integer keys and double values), which takes up much less memory.
    DatasetBuilder
    Produces train/dev/test sets for training coreference models with (optionally) sampling.
    DocumentExamples
    Represents all coreference examples for a particular document.
    EvalUtils
    Utility classes for computing the B^3 and MUC coreference metrics
    EvalUtils.AbstractEvaluator  
    EvalUtils.B3Evaluator  
    EvalUtils.CombinedEvaluator  
    EvalUtils.MUCEvaluator  
    Example
    A representation of a mention-pair for training coreference models.
    FeatureExtractor
    A class for featurizing mention pairs and individual mentions.
    FeatureExtractorRunner
    Runs feature extraction over coreference documents.
    MaxMarginMentionRanker
    A max-margin mention-ranking coreference model.
    MaxMarginMentionRanker.Builder  
    MetadataWriter
    Writes various pieces of information about coreference documents to disk.
    MetaFeatureExtractor
    Class for filtering out input features and producing feature conjunctions.
    MetaFeatureExtractor.Builder  
    PairwiseModel
    Pairwise mention-classification model.
    PairwiseModel.Builder  
    PairwiseModelTrainer
    Class for training coreference models
    SimpleLinearClassifier
    A simple linear classifier trained by SGD with support for several different loss functions and learning rate schedules.
    StatisticalCorefAlgorithm
    Does best-first coreference resolution by linking each mention to its highest scoring candidate antecedent if that score is above a threshold.
    StatisticalCorefProperties
    Manages the properties for training and running statistical coreference systems.
    StatisticalCorefTrainer
    Main class for training new statistical coreference systems.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    MaxMarginMentionRanker.ErrorType  
    MetaFeatureExtractor.PairConjunction  
    MetaFeatureExtractor.SingleConjunction
